flawed_nl_solution:
Harry's father is 50 years + 24 years = <<50+24=74>>74 years old.
Harry's mother is 1/25 * 50 years = <<1/25*50=1250/1>>1250/1 years younger than his father.
So she is currently 74 years - 1250/1 years = <<74-1250/1=-1176>>-1176 years old.
So when Harry was born, she was -1176 years - 50 years = <<-1176-50=-1226>>-1226 years old.
#### -1226

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 1250/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
